mapper.insert: insert into community(seq, category, writer, subject, content, cmnt_file, readcount, re_seq ) values((select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from community), #{category}, #{writer}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{cmnt_file}, #{readcount}, (select nvl(max(re_seq),0)+1 from community))
mapper.update: update community set readcount=readcount+1 where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from community where subject like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
select * from community where content like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
mapper.update: update community set category=#{category}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
